== Thiruvalla (M) (803303) ==

Thiruvalla (M) is a town in the [[Thiruvalla]] taluka of [[Pathanamthitta]] district with an area of 27.15 sq. km. and harbouring 13952 households with total population of 52883 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Pathanamthitta]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 128 km. Male population is 24817 and female population is 28066. Scheduled Caste population is 4488 and Scheduled Tribes population is 237. Census Location Code of the town is 803303<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 72 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 128 km. Railway station is at Thiruvalla at a distance of 0 km.
